entry.title: Help wanted: translations
entry.summary: A member of the Bitcoin-development mailing list is seeking help to coordinate translation efforts for the project. Another member, Nils Schneider, has exported all .ts files to Transifex and provides a link for interested parties to contribute. Geir Harald Hansen offers to take on the task of translating the project into Norwegian Bokm√•l if it is added to the platform. The email also includes an ad for Cisco's Learning program and a link to sign up for more information.
